product_name: Lipton Honey Lemon Green Tea Bags, 100 Pieces: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Worms in each and every Tea Bag
reviews.review_body: This is really pathetic .Amazon please take a serious note of this and reach out to LIPTON.How can they provide this type of items and what quality standards are they passing ???

Undoubtedly tea is good, but we are getting less quantity of tea in a bag. If you compare it's tea bag with Organic India tea bag, Lipton tea bag will give you light tea.So, basically we are getting less tea in almost same price.My last purchase, organic India is way better n tasty.

reviews.review_title: Many people have reviewed saying that you won't like the taste in the beginning
reviews.review_body: Many people have reviewed saying that you won't like the taste in the beginning. But there was no such thing with me. Watched so many people saying that it's good for health and finally I've ordered one too. Let's see what good  it does with me.
Around 25% bags received are empty but very nicely packed. This kind of cheating is not expected from a reputated brand.

Skincare is one of the 100 benefits that green tea offers. Green tea is an abundant source of antioxidants that help fight damage-causing free radicals in your skin. This helps maintain the healthy functioning of your skin cells and prevents damage.To cut the long story short here is one life hack which will rejuvenate your facial skin.üçµ After having your cup of goodness, pat the lukewarm tea bag on your face gently and wash off when dry. Make sure you target your blackheads, dark circles or acne if any. As green tea draws out impurities from your pores, toning your skin and minimizing pore size.If you benefit out from my tip then do come back and hit the 'Helpful Button'. 2gm/serving (picture attached)

reviews.review_title: Request for change of tea bag cover
reviews.review_body: sir, while this product is the most cheap tea available in the market one suggestion from my side, is if the cover of tea bags which is polyethene can be replaced by something eco-friendly that would be more beneficial for the society.

reviews.review_title: I think it is duplicate product.
reviews.review_body: Left- purchased in retail.. right- Amazon's product.Last time i perchased same product in retail. Next i found cheaper price in online. But product is totally different. I think it is duplicate. U can see in the picture. The quality of the raper is different compared to retail product. And quantity also less. And they used steple pin to the packets.

reviews.review_title: Taste is good. Green tea is better than normal tea
reviews.review_body: Taste is good. Green tea is better than normal tea. It is loaded with lots of health benefits. Shipped in just 2 days. Thanks Amazon for great deal in price and super fast delivery.
